result.reason: The current fix forces the gateway authentication dialog to be parented to the main window, which causes it to be hidden or inaccessible when the connection is in a detached or floating window.
result.approach: Modify SetRdpClientProperties in RdpProtocol.cs to set UIParentWindowHandle to Control.FindForm()?.Handle ?? _frmMain.Handle. This ensures the authentication dialog is properly parented to the actual window containing the RDP control (whether main or detached).
